metadata.synopsis: Karlach reacts to Mol's deal in HAV,
metadata.how_to_trigger: Companion Karalch in party and go through mol's deal in HAV.

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: One of the worst things about getting old? Watching kids make the same exact mistakes you made, and knowing there's absolutely nothing you can say to change their mind.
1.context: NodeContext: Sad chuckle. Contemplating Mol going too far in her dealings with Raphael and wanting to save her if she can.

4.speaker: Karlach
4.text: Then again, Mol's a hell of a lot smarter than I was at that age. Maybe she'll figure it all out.
4.context: NodeContext: Sad chuckle. Contemplating Mol going too far in her dealings with Raphael and wanting to save her if she can.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: She will. She's clever - frighteningly so.
3.context: NodeContext: Sad chuckle. Contemplating Mol going too far in her dealings with Raphael and wanting to save her if she can.

2.speaker: Karlach
2.text: True enough. She'll go far in the city. We've just got to get her there safely.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Maybe. Maybe not. Either way, she can look after herself.
0.context: NodeContext: Sad chuckle. Contemplating Mol going too far in her dealings with Raphael and wanting to save her if she can.

5.speaker: Karlach
5.text: Hope you're right. I'll keep an eye on her anyway. Doesn't hurt to have a beefy auntie on your side, right?

7.speaker: Player
7.text: She's on thin ice. My gold's on her falling through.
7.context: NodeContext: Sad chuckle. Contemplating Mol going too far in her dealings with Raphael and wanting to save her if she can.

6.speaker: Karlach
6.text: If that happens, maybe ol' auntie fire hands can pull her out.
6.context: NodeContext: Sad chuckle. Contemplating Mol going too far in her dealings with Raphael and wanting to save her if she can.
